Primary Weaponry.name: SG-20 Halt
Primary Weaponry.traits: Light Armor Penetrating,Medium Armor Penetrating,Rounds Reload

Armor Passives.passive-description: 50% less chance of getting killed by lethal damage and prevents bleeding from chest hemorrhages
Reduces recoil while crouching or laying down by 30% and increases grenade capacity by 2
Reduces recoil while crouching or laying down by 30% while granting 50% resistance to explosions
Increases Stim capacity by 2 and increases their duration by two seconds
Increases grenade throwing range by 30% and adds 50% bonus to limb health
Markers placed on maps scan the area every two seconds, reduces enemy detection by 30%
Increases melee damage by 50%. Improves weapons handling with less drag on weapon movement.
Provides 75% damage resistance to fire, allowing bearer to rest assured in their inflammability.
Provides 80% resistance to gas damage and effects.

Reduces the amount of aim punch from taking damage while firing a weapon by 95%, reducing the amount of camera shake along with it. Also decreases the amount of time required for your Helldiver to maniacly laugh while constinuously firing their weapon by 1 second.
Provides 50% resistance to fire, gas, acid, and electrical damage.
Increases reload speed of primary weapons by 30%. Increases ammo capacity of primary weapons by 20%.
Armor explodes 1.5s after the wearer dies.
Increases reload speed of primary weapons by 30%. Gives wearer a 50% chance to avoid grievous limb injury. Increases melee damage by 50%.
Provides +25% resistance to chest damage. Provides +25% resistance to explosive damage. Prevents all damage from bleeding if chest hemorrhages.

Stratagems.name: Machine Gun
Stratagems.description: A machine gun designed for stationary use. Trades higher power for increased recoil and reduced accuracy.

Stratagems.name: Anti-Materiel Rifle
Stratagems.description: A high caliber sniper rifle effective over long distances against light vehicle armor. This rifle must be aimed downscope.

Stratagems.name: Stalwart
Stratagems.description: A compact, low caliber machine gun. Trades power for ease of use, with faster reloading than heavier machine guns.

Stratagems.name: Expendable Anti-Tank
Stratagems.description: A single-use weapon specialized for damaging vehicle armor. Discarded after every use.

Stratagems.name: Recoilless Rifle
Stratagems.description: A recoilless rifle effective against vehicle armor. Includes support backpack required for reloading.

Stratagems.name: Flamethrower
Stratagems.description: An incendiary weapon for close range. Will ignite targets, terrain, and any flammable teammates.

Stratagems.name: Autocannon
Stratagems.description: A fully-automatic cannon effective against light vehicle armor. Includes support backpack required for reloading.

Stratagems.name: Railgun
Stratagems.description: An experimental weapon which prioritizes armor penetration. Must be charged between shots - so choose targets carefully.

Stratagems.name: Spear
Stratagems.description: An anti-tank homing missle which must lock onto its target before launch. Effective against large and armored enemies.

Stratagems.name: Orbital Gatling Barrage
Stratagems.description: A barrage of high explosive rounds, fired from the Destroyer's high speed rotary autocannons.

Stratagems.name: Orbital Airburst Strike
Stratagems.description: A projectile which explodes while airborne, creating a deadly rain of shrapnel. Not effective against heavy armor.

Stratagems.name: Orbital 120MM HE Barrage
Stratagems.description: A precision artillery salvo over a small area, perfect for taking out concentrated enemy units.

Stratagems.name: Orbital 380MM HE Barrage
Stratagems.description: A prolonged barrage, wreaking extended destruction over a large area. Communication with teammates is advised.

Stratagems.name: Orbital Walking Barrage
Stratagems.description: A linear artillery barrage which moves at intervals, driving the enemy out from cover while allowing an advance.

Stratagems.name: Orbital Laser
Stratagems.description: The Destroyer's laser cannon will sweep over the designated area, vaporizing all targets within the effective radius.

Stratagems.name: Orbital Railcannon Strike
Stratagems.description: A high-velocity railcannon round fired at the largest target in close proximity to the beacon. Targeting is automatic.

Stratagems.name: Eagle Strafing Run
Stratagems.description: A strafing run of the battlefield to clear small targets, delivered almost instantly.

Stratagems.name: Eagle Airstrike
Stratagems.description: A barrage of bombs creating a non-targeted carpet of explosions.

Stratagems.name: Eagle Cluster Bomb
Stratagems.description: A targeted air strike unable to destroy buildings, but efficient at clearing smaller targets.

Stratagems.name: Eagle Napalm Airstrike
Stratagems.description: A barrage of napalm bombs, creating a wall of fire which will stop the enemy in their tracks.

Stratagems.name: Jump Pack
Stratagems.description: Enables the user to jump higher than 'gravity' and 'safety' would normally allow. Must be charged before use.

Stratagems.name: Eagle Smoke Strike
Stratagems.description: A barrage of smoke grenades, creating a thick smoke screen to block enemies' line of sight.

Stratagems.name: Eagle 110MM Rocket Pods
Stratagems.description: A barrage of rocket pods, which the Eagle pilot will release on the largest target near the stratagem beacon.

Stratagems.name: Eagle 500kg Bomb
Stratagems.description: A large bomb obliterating almost any target close to impact. Make sure to clear the area.

Stratagems.name: Orbital Precision Strike
Stratagems.description: A single precision shot from the Destroyer's 'ATLAS' cannon.

Stratagems.name: Orbital Gas Strike
Stratagems.description: A projectile which releases a cloud of corrosive gas, harmful to both organic and robotic lifeforms.

Stratagems.name: Orbital EMS Strike
Stratagems.description: A ""compliance weapon"" to modify enemy behavior. The projectile temporarily stuns all targets within the strike radius.

Stratagems.name: Orbital Smoke Strike
Stratagems.description: Creates a large, thick smoke screen to block targets' line of sight.

Stratagems.name: HMG Emplacement
Stratagems.description: A manned fortification offering superior firepower against lightly armored targets. Slow to turn, so place it wisely.

Stratagems.name: Shield Generator Relay
Stratagems.description: A stationary energy shield which provides cover against projectiles. has a limited lifetime once deployed.

Stratagems.name: Tesla Tower
Stratagems.description: A turret which fires electrical charges at targets in close range. To avoid friendly fire, remain prone.

Stratagems.name: Grenadier Battlement
Stratagems.description: A stationary ballistic cover with a mounted grenade launcher. Can protect multiple Helldivers from small arms fire.

Stratagems.name: Anti-Personnel Minefield
Stratagems.description: Deploys a defensive anti-personnel minefield, to halt enemy advance.

Stratagems.name: Supply Pack
Stratagems.description: Supply boxes containing ammunition, with a backpack that allows the user to distribute boxes to fellow Helldivers.

Stratagems.name: Grenade Launcher
Stratagems.description: A grenade launcher effective against armored infantry. Not intended for use against vehicle armor or fortified buildings.

Stratagems.name: Laser Cannon
Stratagems.description: A laser weapon firing a continuous beam. Doesn't require ammunition, but will need heat sink replaced if it overheats.

Stratagems.name: Incendiary Mines
Stratagems.description: Deploys a defensive incendiary minefield, which will set both terrain and targets alight when triggered.

Stratagems.name: "Guard Dog" Rover
Stratagems.description: An autonomous drone equipped with a laser rifle, providing 360Â° cover. Returns to backpack to cool down.

Stratagems.name: Ballistic Shield Backpack
Stratagems.description: A backpack which can be wielded as a one-handed ballistic shield, protecting against small arms fire.

Stratagems.name: Arc Thrower
Stratagems.description: Projects an arc of lightning at close range. Charges up to project bolts, and may discharge through multiple targets.

Stratagems.name: Shield Generator Pack
Stratagems.description: Encloses the wearer in a spherical shield which blocks high-speed projectiles. Has a limited lifetime once deployed.

Stratagems.name: Machine Gun Sentry
Stratagems.description: An agile automated machine gun turret. Will fire at targets even if Helldivers will be caught in the crossfire.

Stratagems.name: Gatling Sentry
Stratagems.description: An automated turret with an extremely high rate of fire. Caution: does not check if friendly units are in line of fire.

Stratagems.name: Mortar Sentry
Stratagems.description: A turret firing powerful shells in a high arc. Effective at long ranges, and able to strike at targets behind cover.

Stratagems.name: "Guard Dog"
Stratagems.description: An autonomous drone equipped with a Liberator assault rifle, providing 360Â° cover. Returns to backpack to rearm.

Stratagems.name: Autocannon Sentry
Stratagems.description: An automated cannon turret firing anti-tank ammunition over long ranges. Sacrifice agility for range and power.

Stratagems.name: Rocket Sentry
Stratagems.description: A powerful automated turret, effective against armored targets. The turret will primarily aim at larger enemies.

Stratagems.name: EMS Mortar Sentry
Stratagems.description: A turret firing static field generators that slow the advance of enemies.

Stratagems.name: Patriot Exosuit
Stratagems.description: A heavily-armored walking exosuit equipped with a rocket launcher and a heavy machine gun.

Stratagems.name: Heavy Machine Gun
Stratagems.description: A very powerful but difficult-to-wield machine gun with intense recoil.

Stratagems.name: Quasar Cannon
Stratagems.description: Charges up to fire a powerful, explosive energy burst.  Has a long cooldown period after firing.

Stratagems.name: Airburst Rocket Launcher
Stratagems.description: Fires a rocket that detonates within proximity of a target, and deploys a cluster of explosive bomblets.

Stratagems.name: Emancipator Exosuit
Stratagems.description: A heavily-armored walking exosuit equipped with dual autocannons.

Stratagems.name: Commando
Stratagems.description: An expendable missile launcher equipped with four laser-guided missiles.

Stratagems.name: Anti-Tank Mines
Stratagems.description: Scatters powerful anti-tank mines that deal heavy, armor-penetrating damage. Minefield is less densely packed relative to smaller mines.

Stratagems.name: Sterilizer
Stratagems.description: Atomizes caustic chemicals into a fine mist that liquifies sensitive electronics and tissues. Blinds and slows most enemies.

Stratagems.name: "Guard Dog" Dog Breath
Stratagems.description: A done that defends its user by firing caustic gas at nearby enemies. Returns to backpack to refill.

Stratagems.name: Orbital Napalm Barrage
Stratagems.description: Launches a prolonged barrage of napalm shells over a wide area, setting a swath of land ablaze in mere moments.

Stratagems.name: Directional Shield
Stratagems.description: A one-handed device that deploys a wide energy barrier in front of the user. The barrier is semipermeable and blocks high-speed projectiles from the outside only, leaving the user free to shoot through it.

Stratagems.name: Flame Sentry
Stratagems.description: An automated flamethrower turret. Warning: fuel canister prone to explosion when ruptured.

Stratagems.name: Anti-Tank Emplacement
Stratagems.description: A powerful manned gun emplacement, capable of taking out armored targets at long ranges.

Stratagems.name: StA-X3 WASP Launcher
Stratagems.description: A versatile missile launcher loaded with seven lock-on homing missiles. These can either be fired from the launcher directly or as an airburst. Includes support backpack required for reloading. Produced by Stal Arms.

Stratagems.name: Fast Recon Vehicle
Stratagems.description: A lightly-armored reconnaissance vehicle mounted with a heavy machinegun.

Stratagems.name: Portable Hellbomb
Stratagems.description: A backpack-mounted Hellbomb that can be armed by the wearer or an ally, starting a countdown. Users are recommended to remove the backpack before the countdown reaches zero.

Stratagems.name: One True Flag
Stratagems.description: The eternal colors of Super Earth can never be tainted. Only quenched, by the blood of its enemies.

Stratagems.name: De-Escalator
Stratagems.description: A humane grenade launcher firing high-powered arc grenades.

Stratagems.name: "Guard Dog" K-9
Stratagems.description: A humane, autonomous drone equipped with a modified Arc Thrower. Capable of projecting arcs of lightning through multiple targets. Does not need to recharge between shots.

Boosters.name: Hellpod Space Optimization
Boosters.effect: Helldivers come out of the Hellpod fully stocked on Ammo, Grenades, and Stims.

Boosters.name: Vitality Enhancement
Boosters.effect: Allows all Helldivers to resist injury.

Boosters.name: UAV Recon Booster
Boosters.effect: Increases all Helldivers' effective radar range.

Boosters.name: Stamina Enhancement
Boosters.effect: Increases all Helldivers' stamina capacity and recovery.

Boosters.name: Muscle Enhancement
Boosters.effect: Allows Helldivers to traverse difficult terrain with ease.

Boosters.name: Increased Reinforcement Budget
Boosters.effect: Increases the number of available reinforcements.

Boosters.name: Flexible Reinforcement Budget
Boosters.effect: Reduces time until new reinforcements are granted once they've been depleted.

Boosters.name: Localization Confusion
Boosters.effect: Increases the time between enemy encounters

Boosters.name: Expert Extraction Pilot
Boosters.effect: Lowers the time it takes for the extraction shuttle to reach the extraction beacon.

Boosters.name: Motivational Shocks
Boosters.effect: Allows all Helldivers to recover faster after being slowed by an attack, such as acid. Does not mitigate "area effects," such as EMS strikes.

Boosters.name: Experimental Infusion
Boosters.effect: In addition to restoring health, Stims temporarily increase movement speed and damage reduction.  Causes trembling.

Boosters.name: Firebomb Hellpods
Boosters.effect: Lines all Hellpods with volatile incendiaries that detonate upon impact, igniting any units in vicinity of the drop site.

Boosters.name: Dead Sprint
Boosters.effect: Allows Helldivers to keep sprinting even when they are out of stamina, draining their health instead.

Boosters.name: Armed Resupply Pods
Boosters.effect: Mounts a modified AR-23 Liberator to all resupply pods, allowing them to double as automatic turrets.

Ship Modules.name: Donation Access License
Ship Modules.effect: Support Weapons deploy with the maximum number of carriable magazines
